mapper.select: select report_id, b.pagename "title" from report_collect a, portal_user_save b where a.report_id = b.pageid and b.is3g = 'y' and a.user_id = #{userId} order by a.crtdate desc
mapper.insert: insert into report_collect(report_id, user_id, crtdate) values(#{rid}, #{userId},now())
mapper.delete: delete from report_collect where user_id = #{userId} and report_id = #{rid}
